item.title: We are hiring for position of “IOS Developer”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post We are hiring for position of “IOS Developer” appeared first on Percept Systems.
item.content:encoded:
APPLY HERE

[contact-form-7]

We are looking for a iOS Developer with experience in development and architecture of iPad and iPhone applications who has a keen interest in the best practices. Software will provide you with a challenging but enjoyable working environment where you will work on interesting projects using the latest technologies. You will learn and grow as well as teach the other members of the team. We are enthusiastic and passionate about what we do and want everyone to enjoy learning and have fun doing it!

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Proficient with Objective-C or Swift and Cocoa Touch
  • Experience with iOS frameworks such as Core Data, Core Animation, etc.
  • Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
  • Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services
  • Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards
  • Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines
  • Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools
  • Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
  • Knack for benchmarking and optimization
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools
  • Familiarity with continuous integration
  • Must be quality oriented individual and must be good in communication.

Benefits

  • Excellent hike on current salary
  • Alternative saturdays off
  • Day Shifts
  • Gaming Session every saturday

Experience
6 Month

The post We are hiring for position of “IOS Developer” appeared first on Percept Systems.

item.title: We are hiring for position of “PHP Developer”
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post We are hiring for position of “PHP Developer” appeared first on Percept Systems.
item.content:encoded:
APPLY HERE

[contact-form-7]
We are hiring,
A PHP Developer writes fast PHP to a high standard, in a timely and scalable way that improves the code-base of our products in meaningful ways. You will be a part of a full-stack creative team that is responsible for all aspects of the ongoing software development from the initial specification, through to developing, testing and launching.
Responsibilities and Duties
  • We are looking for a PHP Developer who is dedicated to the craft, writes code that they are proud of and can hit the ground running.
  • Proven software development experience in PHP.
  • Yii2 Framework Mandatory
  • Core PHP, Angular 2, My SQL, WordPress, Jquery, CMS, Angular js etc.
  • Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, CSS, Javascript, etc
  • Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services.

Benefits

  • Excellent hike on current salary.
  • Alternative saturdays off.
  • Day Shifts.
  • Gaming Session every saturday.
  • Employee of the month benefits.

Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
any graduate or post graduate can apply

Salary:
₹10,000.00 to ₹30,000.00 /month

The post We are hiring for position of “PHP Developer” appeared first on Percept Systems.
